trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of the ankheg's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the ankheg or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The ankheg can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ankheg makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the ankheg can't bite another target.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Acid Spit {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg spits fiery acid in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The ankheg can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The ankheg can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ankheg makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 4d12 + 8}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the ankheg can't bite another target.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Acid Spit {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg spits acid in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the ankheg's choice that is within 120 feet of the ankheg and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the ankheg's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The ankheg moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Frightful Presence
entries: The ankheg uses its Frightful Presence.

legendary.name: Command Ankheg (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The queen targets one ankheg it can see within 60 feet of it. If the ankheg can see and hear the queen, the ankheg can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll. Alternatively, the ankheg can use its reaction to move up to its speed.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ankheg has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the ankheg's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided that it has no creature {@condition grappled}. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The ankheg can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the ankheg can't bite another target.

action.name: Acid Spit {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg spits acid in a line that is 60 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided that it has no creature {@condition grappled}. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ankheg's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ankheg has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The ankheg's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Runic Augmentation
entries: When the ankheg deals acid damage, it can change the damage type to cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ankheg makes two melee or ranged attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Acid Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided that it has no creature {@condition grappled}. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
